attributes.action: Ensure Motorway Matrix and Message Boards Give Accurate Information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too often Motorway Matrix signs give wrong information.
They are not cancelled after incidents are cleared.
A speed limit is shown but the display board is blank.
Often one or more of the four flashing lights on a sign is not working.
Mandatory Limits are often set to low.
Non-mandatory limits are ingnored.
The "change lane" and "Do not proceed furtherin this lane" are not Policed.
